<title level="1" right="Trait">[Training](/Traits.aspx?ID=492)</title>

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup>

A training weapon is designed to be used when training an animal to participate in combat by identifying the target for the animal to attack. Striking a creature with a training weapon gives your [animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=149) or your [bonded animal](/Feats.aspx?ID=762) a +1 circumstance bonus to its next attack roll against that target.
